news.title: Galway farmer who caused aunt's death when he drove over her in teleporter has sentence reduced by 18 months
news.summary: A farmer who acted in a "thuggish" manner towards his elderly aunt, before causing her death by driving over her in an agricultural teleporter, has had his sentence reduced by 18 months following a successful appeal.

news.title: Enoch Burke to remain in prison over Christmas unless he purges contempt, High Court rules
news.summary: Enoch Burke will stay in prison over Christmas unless he purges his contempt of court, a judge has ordered.

news.title: Man (20s) dies during firearms incident in Carlow
news.summary: A man has died following what appears to be an accidental shooting in Co Carlow.

news.title: Rúaidhrí O’Connor: Ireland have never had a better chance to break World Cup glass ceiling as Scotland game looms large
news.summary: To paraphrase Mick McCarthy, Andy Farrell would have bitten your hand off for a scenario where his Ireland team had to beat Scotland and Argentina to reach a first World Cup semi-final, most likely against England.

news.title: Gardaí called in about new case of missing child, minister reveals as Kyran Durnin review to remain unpublished
news.summary: Gardaí have been called in about a third missing child, Children’s Minister Norma Foley has revealed.

news.title: Loyalist group calls for GAA president Jarlath Burns to resign over Kilmichael commemoration speech
news.summary: A loyalist advocacy group has called on the GAA president to resign for attending the annual Kilmichael commemoration in Co Cork.

news.title: Máire Treasa Ní Cheallaigh: Oversharing your details online makes identity fraud too easy for scammers
news.summary: If a scammer wanted to build a file on you, they’d start by looking for your date of birth, your location and the names of the people closest to you.
